issue_1.name: Emergence Map Bootstrap
issue_1.resolution: Barycentric interpolation provides metric-free continuous extension via volume ratios (determinants). The R³ embedding is computational convenience.

issue_2.name: Dimensional Formula D = N + 1
issue_2.resolution: Formula derived from weight space (N-1) + radial (1) + time (1) = N+1. Acknowledged as consistency check, not first-principles derivation.

warning.name: Quantum Fluctuations
warning.resolution: Path integral analysis confirms phase stability. Goldstone modes factor out. Decoherence suppressed by exp(-S_tunnel) ~ exp(-1000).
